summary: Quadriplegics, who play full-contact rugby in wheelchairs, overcome unimaginable obstacles to compete in the Paralympic Games in Athens, Greece.
cast: Joe Soares|Robert Soares|Patti Soares|Mark Zupan|Christopher Igoe|Jessica Wampler|Jeff Nickell|Frank Cava|Keith Cavill|Joann Cavill|Robert Cavill|Scott Hogsett|Bob Lujano|Andy Cohn|John Bishop|Noemia Botelho|Philip Botelho|Beth Bourgeois|Willard Brooks|Aimee Bruder|Kelly Butler|Catherine Cadieux|Jennifer Cadieux|John Camacho|Sean Carroll|Ian Chan|Allen Chartrand|Cliff Chunn|Christine Coppa|Steve Costa|Eddie Crouch|Jason Curran|Chris Everson|Sammy Frazier|Marty Frierson|Greg Gandy|Dave Gagne|Big George|Mike Gilliland|Sam Gloor|Will Groulx|James Gumbert|Wendy Gumbert|Garrett Hickling|Michelle Hogsett|Steve Kearly|Bryan Kirkland|Steven Kirshblum|Rob Krows|Fabien Lavoie|Benoit Labrecque|Nancy Lehrer|Margarida Leite|Tony Leite|Bob Lujano Sr.|Norm Lyduch|Dean MacCabe|Robert McCagney|Jim Murdock|Lynn Nelson|Jean Nickell|Lisa Lujano Oliver|Kevin Orr|Steve Pate|Brent Poppen|Lynn Roesser|Mark Roesser|Wayne Romero|Eddie Schmeisser|Sheena Sethi|Patrice Simard|Mandy Sharman|Ed Suhr|Jane Thomas|Byron Turner|Mike Whitehead|Dave Willsie|Pawel Zbieranowski|Jeff Zupan|Linda Zupan|Thomas Zupan|Team Usa Quad Rugby|Team Canada Quad Rugby|George W. Bush|Laura Bush
director: Directors: Henry Alex Rubin, Dana Adam Shapiro
title: Murderball
